name: 魔法小猫（MagicCat）
detailed_description:
You can select the second option to launch the English version.

Some friends say that this method can't run the game, or you can open an EXE called "MagicCat (E)" in the folder of the game directory.
Default installation directory:
( The hard disk you chose ):\Steam\Install\steamapps\common\MagicCat

My English isn't very good, there must be some grammatical mistakes, thank you for your understand.
==========================
On an unknown planet, more cats and fewer monsters live there.
One day, the leader of the monsters has avenged the cats because of the previous contradictions. He used the power of a magic crystal to seal the guardian planet's Mythological animals into the crystal balls and lock them into different places. Since then, the planet's ecological environment has begun to change badly, and the cat's disaster and crisis began to followed...
The actor of the story is a white cat named Frina, who as the magician of the cats, she will take the mission of saving the cat race and the Mythological animals on the journey, to meet the unknown scenery ahead.

The game was made with RPGMakerMV, and I combined the cat and the monster with some of my favorite MAG elements. There're a lot of plot points, and I only made a single ending, so this game's playability is not very high. If you have a high requirement for entertainment, please don't place the order.
There may be some missing frames during scene switching. I recommend that you close the redundant program while running the game to ensure the game experience be smooth.

short_description: This is a story about cats and monsters. You will be a magical cat who need to save the world and take part in an unforgettable journey.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/win8/win10
  • Processor:
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/win8/win10
  • Processor:
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
